detail_desc: Cotton cap with a sweatband inside in a cotton weave, and elastication at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in cotton denim. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, buttons down the front and a tie belt at the waist. The cotton content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, buttons down the front and a tie-detail hem.
Slim-fit, knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim. High waist with adjustable elastication (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, and back pockets.
Adjustable, patterned fabric bracelets with charms in the shape of butterflies and hearts inscribed with BFF. Not for children under 3.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Fitted body in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves with overlocked hems, and press-studs at the crotch.
Chunky metal chain bracelets with fasteners.
Short dress in a crisp cotton weave with a V-neck, flounced wrapover front, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs and narrow ties at the waist. Lined skirt.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.

Dungaree shorts in soft, washed denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides, a chest pocket, front and back pockets, and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the dungaree shorts is partly recycled.
Cropped, straight-cut top in jersey with glittery threads and long sleeves.
Wide dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam under the bust, long sleeves with narrow cuffs and a straight-cut, pleated skirt. Lined.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a wide hem.
Knee-length jersey dress with a round neckline with an opening and button at the top, and decorative pleats at the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Short-sleeved wrapover blouse in linen with a deep V-neck and buttons at the front, adjustable safety buttons at one side and ties at the other. Seam at the waist and a peplum.

Sports trousers in heavy jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and side pockets with a concealed zip. Ventilated mesh section at the crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Imitation leather sandals with narrow straps and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

High-waisted paper bag trousers in woven fabric with a zip fly and concealed button, and a detachable fabric belt with a covered metal buckle. Pockets in the side seams, fake welt back pockets and wide, straight legs with creases.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in bodysuit. Flounce over the shoulders, short sleeves and press-studs at the shoulders and crotch.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties that fasten at one side, and a wrapover skirt.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a chest pocket and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Straight, wide bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in a soft, textured knit with ribbed edges at the short sides.
Joggers in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, front pockets and a back pocket. Tapered legs with seams at the knees and embroidered appliqués.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and pair of culottes in airy cotton voile. Top with a frill-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Culottes with covered elastication at the waist and wide, calf-length legs.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in a soft, lustrous weave in a straight style with a small stand-up collar and covered press-studs down the front. Chest pockets, concealed pockets in the side seams, a yoke seam at the back and slits in the sides. Lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon in a narrow cut at the top with a small, frilled collar. Gathers around the neck and a deep opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Lined.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and buttons down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Top in a crêpe weave with a scalloped V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined.
Fitted jumper in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons at the top and long sleeves.

Straight-cut blouse in crinkled jersey with a round neckline that is low-cut at the back with horizontal ties at the back of the neck. Wide, gathered puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems.

Single-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar, shoulder tabs with a button, and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and buttons at the front. Loose yoke at the back, partial yoke at the front, side pockets and an inner pocket. Tab and metal fastener at the cuffs and a single back vent.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Hat in braided paper straw with ears on top, embroidery and sequins on the front and a spotted grosgrain band. Width of brim 4 cm.
Hat in a soft cotton knit with a ribbed hem and earflaps with ties. Jersey lining.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Mesh inner shorts.
Jacket in textured jersey. Relaxed fit with notch lapels, patch front pockets and no fasteners. Unlined.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Short 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details and a zip fly.
Cold shoulder jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with narrow shoulder straps, long sleeves and ribbing around the top, cuffs and hem.

Slip in sturdy microfibre with lace details with a sculpting effect on the waist and back. Push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jumper in soft, loose-knit chenille with a deep V-neck and low dropped shoulders. Longer at the back.

Shirt in airy end-on-end cotton with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a viscose blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Small shoulder bag in the shape of a mini backpack in woven fabric containing glittery threads. Narrow shoulder strap with metal-chain sections up from the bag and a press-stud at one end. Small handle and a zip at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Taffeta lining made from recycled polyester. Depth 3 cm. Width 5 cm. Height 9 cm.

Cotton canvas backpack with imitation leather details, a handle and concealed drawstring at the top and a flap with an adjustable metal fastener. Padded, adjustable shoulder straps, two outer compartments with a flap and press-stud and a padded laptop compartment. Padded backplate and base. Size 18x28x43 cm.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.

Dog bed with sturdy woven fabric on the outside and soft faux fur on the inside. Firmly stuffed to keep its shape. Small imitation leather appliqué on the front and anti-slip protectors underneath. Size approx. 34x44 cm.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Glasses with no lenses and glittery plastic frames.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with decorative straps at the front and lined cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back with mesh detail and wide elastic at the hem. Light support.
Fully lined, cropped vest top in sturdy jersey with visible seams. Racer back with a cut-out section, and wide elastication at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim and dropped shoulders.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets with decorative, gathered frills, back pockets and elasticated hems.
Satin top with a gently draped neckline and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Tailored trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a regular waist and zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Mittens in a soft, fine knit. Fleece lining.

Oversized puffer jacket in a padded weave with a high collar and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Diagonal side pockets, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with covered elastication and a hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Elasticated drawstring at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Vest tops in ribbed cotton jersey with a visible elastic trim at the top, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable elastic shoulder straps.
Hoop earrings in metal with faceted plastic beads. Diameter 3.8 cm.
Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping weave. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
5-pocket shorts in cotton denim in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, button fly, low crotch and straight, wide legs.
Platform trainers in cotton canvas with lacing at the front and a grosgrain loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform approx. 4.5 cm.
